Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

This class allows details about a person to be entered and stored. There are Getters and Setters to mutate and access details of the object There is a printDetails method to print all information about a person (object)

Version:
3 (8/12/2014)
Author:
(Laurens op t Zandt, Joost van Woensel)

Constructor Detail

Person

public Person()
Constructor for objects of class Persoon It sets default values for all field variables. No meaningfull value is assigned here, this has to be done via the setters methods.

setGender

public void setGender(char gender)
This method allows the user to set their gender. it takes a character, namely m or v It has a check to make sure the character entered is valid.
